answers.answer: Me too. I'm having the hardest time eatting food, and I feel hungary but can't eat. I happy to knowI'm not the only one going through this.
I'm 37 weeks and been going through this as well for the past couple weeks.

I have felt like this the whole pregnancy!! I have a friend who is a few weeks behind me and always saying how she eats constantly and always hungry. I dont know how she does it.. I cant even finish a yogurt without feeling like I'm going to burst haha:)
Me to I just ate 1/2 burger and I feel like I'm gonna burst.
I haven't gained any weight with my pregnancy..I am almost 37 weeks. My doctor told me I cant lose anymore..but I feel like doctors dont understand how pregnancy is different for everyone

At the beginning I lost weight but now im within standards but I just feel like im going to burst all the time! Ugh this *****! I wish I could eat. I know this sounds shallow but I was so excited about being able to eat a lot while pregnant lol. But that didnt happen.
^ exactly! It's like a chore. Haha:)
I'm the same way, I haven't been able to eat, I feel hungry but the thought of food just don't sound good. But I know I need to feed my baby so  I do my best to eat what I can.

Yes me too! My dr said its because the baby is squishing ypur stomach and there for you cant eat as much as usual! My eyes feel like i can devour two double cheese burgers! But ny stomach can OBLY rat two bites! Lol

I'm the complete opposite right now. In the beginning that was so me I could barely eat I gother full instantly. Now that I'm 9 months it has gotten way better..but I eat small meals every 2 hrs. I hope it gets better for u.

I felt the same way until I was about 35 weeks. I'm a first time mom and everyone I asked said it was the opposite, but I barely gained 10lbs during my whole pregnancy and whenever I ate I felt a ton on pressure and bloating, especially on my ribs. But then after about 35 weeks my baby dropped and it was like the cravings took over. Now I can't stop eating and have gained another four lbs in just a week. I thought it was preeclampsia and got worried, but my doctor said there's no protein in my urine and my blood pressure is normal, so he was just in the way and sitting too high. Now that he's dropped and I can eat I feel a lot better. Before I had to force myself to eat when I wasn't full because I thought he wasn't getting enough to eat, but it turns out he was just sitting too high.

I have to eat small meals otherwise I feel like I will burst or even puke! So I try to just snack throughout the day and make sure I'm getting all the things I need like lots of water fruits veggies and meat!

I am 19 weeks. I feel like i get full really fast.   I think it's because I have a shorter torso so my stomach is pushed up with the baby.Good thing is I am fat and now losing weight.  My doctor is not worried because as she said, when you start out being heavier than most,  it's okay to not gained as long as I am not trying to starve myself.

question: Ladies,in your third trimester did you feel like your stomach was stapled and you can eat as much as a bird? I can only eat little bit at a time. It feels like someone is squeezing my stomach and not letting any food in.
title: Eating like a bird
